Luis Huesca
Senior Unity Developer - Game Developer

About

I’m Luis Huesca, a Senior Unity Game Developer specialized in mobile games. I’ve spent the last years designing, building and shipping features for 2D and 3D titles: from gameplay systems and UI flows to tools that make the whole team faster and more consistent.

I enjoy taking ownership of features from prototype to production: breaking down problems, writing clean and maintainable C# code, profiling and optimizing where it matters, and iterating quickly based on player data and team feedback. I’m used to working remotely, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, and balancing fun, usability and monetization.

Adventure Chef

As a Senior Unity Game Developer, I owned client-side development for core gameplay and live-ops features: from implementing restaurant systems and UI flows to optimizing performance and supporting designers with tools and iteration.

  • Company: Metamoki
  • Role: Senior Unity Game Developer
  • Platforms: iOS,Android
  • Engine: Unity(C#)

EverMerge

As a Senior Unity Developer, I supported a large-scale live game by delivering seasonal live-ops events and polish-focused improvements: from implementing event logic and currency/data handling to crafting UI animations, VFX, and running A/B tests to validate iterations. I also improved overall stability by fixing production bugs and elevating visual quality to make the experience feel more refined and cohesive.

  • Company: Nvizzio
  • Role: Senior Unity Developer
  • Platforms: iOS, Android
  • Engine: Unity (C#)

Bingo

As a Unity Developer, I owned the end-to-end delivery of a Bingo mini-game inside Slotsburg: from core gameplay implementation and game data handling (balls, state, progression/rewards) to defining and polishing the UI animations and VFX that make the moment-to-moment experience feel satisfying. I worked across gameplay, presentation, and integration to ship a cohesive feature that fits seamlessly within the main game loop.

  • Company: Nvizzio
  • Role: Senior Unity Developer
  • Platforms: iOS, Android
  • Engine: Unity (C#)

TrueDown

As a Unity Developer (and acting as a lightweight project lead/PM), I helped bring TrueDown to life: a VR horror narrative set in an abandoned building where a ritual went wrong. I translated creative intent into shippable VR gameplay by defining what was feasible, prioritizing scope, and implementing the core interactive moments—combining VR interactions, in-world animations, and VFX to deliver tension, pacing, and immersion across headsets.

  • Company: Eon Reality
  • Role: Unity Developer
  • Platforms: Oculus,SteamVR
  • Engine: Unity (C#)

Broken Gods

Broken Gods is an online multiplayer VR shooter built around in-house hardware, including a custom treadmill locomotion system and proprietary VR rifles. As a Unity Developer and acting project lead/PM, I translated ambitious creative and technical goals into a shippable plan: defining scope, setting priorities, and managing timelines while implementing key VR gameplay systems. My work focused on ensuring the experience felt responsive, immersive, and production-feasible across a complex stack of networking + bespoke devices.

  • Company: Eon Reality
  • Role: Unity Developer
  • Platforms: Oculus,SteamVR
  • Engine: Unity (C#)
